baseline_groups.claim_summary: Exposure to imposed fact-checking reduces French Facebook users stated intention to share fake news (Alt-Facts) on Facebook.
baseline_groups.notes: Baseline is the bivariate OLS of want_share_fb on C(survey) with no controls, extracting C(survey)[T.2] coefficient. The paper Table 2 builds up controls progressively.

global_notes: Single core claim (Imposed FC reduces sharing intent). Non-core: alt treatments (Voluntary FC, Imposed vs Voluntary), alt outcome (want_share_others), heterogeneity interactions, placebos on pre-treatment chars, sample restrictions. robust/outcome/want_share_fb duplicates robust/build/socioeconomic. robust/build/bivariate duplicates baseline. Logit/Probit on log-odds scale.
